A + Fire = B
A + A = A
Fire + Lightning = Sun
Breeze + Breeze = Wind
Burn + Burn = Fire
A + Planet = Earth
Fire + Wind = Smoke
Smoke + Wind = Cloud
A + Liquid = Water
Earth + Message = Letter
Bottle + Letter = Message
Cloud + Fire = Lightning
Sun + Wind = Sunflower
Fire + Message = Smoke Signal  // 14



Gen 1 - 40 Elements -> 40 Total Elements
Gen 2 - 157 Elements -> 197 Total Elements
Gen 3 - 504 Elements -> 701 Total Elements
Gen 4 - 1730 Elements -> 2431 Total Elements
Gen 5 - 5397 Elements -> 7828 Total Elements
Gen 6 - NaN Elements -> NaN Total Elements
